patthana14.35:4.1: Niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.35:5.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana14.35:6.1: Niyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.35:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
